ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Guard Duty Bark 1
ResponseRule.description: He is standing guard in the Cargo Bay. Just beyond the doors and windows there are unimaginable horrors stalking about, so tension is very high. The guards here have witnessed a great deal of death and chaos in the last few hours.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague player futz with door
ResponseRule.description: The door seals off Cargo Bay from the alien swarm outside, and Morgan has just started tampering with the lock that keeps it closed.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Aliens Defeated
ResponseRule.description: Security guards have been trapped by a swarm of aliens and holding out for a miracle, and Morgan has delivered it to them. Morgan made turrets that, combined with the security small-arms fire, wiped out the attacking aliens in this section.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Mourns Sarah
ResponseRule.description: The Chief of Security, Sarah Elazar, died in combat with the aliens. Even though the security forces won they mourn her death. She enabled them to survive this far.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Mourns Dwayne
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Mourns Sam
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Mourns Tamiko
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Mourns Alfred
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Mourns Austin
ResponseRule.description: Security guard mourns a fallen comrade that was killed when they went into battle with a horde of aliens.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Ready for Combat
ResponseRule.description: Security is bracing for an imminent battle with alien forces. They have been holed up in a safe place, but the time has come to fight the aliens

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague: Ready for Combat
ResponseRule.description: Not used anymore. These lines have been ported to other OnUsed and OnApproach dialogs

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Wife Quest
ResponseRule.description: Kevin asks Morgan to check in on his missing wife. When the alien outbreak started on the space station he lost contact with her. He has been unable to leave because of his duties. He has seen so much death he holds out little hope. Particularly because he knows at least some of the escape pods did not work.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague: Wife Quest (Elevator on)
ResponseRule.description: Kevin asks Morgan to check in on his missing wife. When the alien outbreak started on the space station he lost contact with her. He has been unable to leave because of his duties. He has seen so much death he holds out little hope. Particularly because he knows at least some of the escape pods did not work.

He has been unable to leave because of his duties. He has seen so much death he holds out little hope. Particularly because he knows at least some of the escape pods did not work.

ResponseRule.name: Kevin Hague Sad Wife Bark 1
ResponseRule.description: Has survived unimaginable horrors only to discover that his wife died elsewhere on the station.

He has been unable to leave because of his duties. He has seen so much death he holds out little hope. Particularly because he knows at least some of the escape pods did not work.
